MAP_SEARCH_CLASS.label: Map Search Class
MAP_SEARCH_CLASS.description: Class used to search map feeds

ARCGIS_FEATURE_CACHE.label: ArcGIS Feature Cache Folder
ARCGIS_FEATURE_CACHE.description: Location of ArcGIS feature cache data

DEFAULT_ZOOM_LEVEL.label: Default Zoom Level
DEFAULT_ZOOM_LEVEL.description: Default zoom level for maps when not specified by the feed

feedgroups.title: Groups
feedgroups.description: The map module organizes geographic data by groups. Each group may have multiple categories and subcategories defined by the feed. Groups might represent campuses or geographically distinct areas (such as cities or regions)

center.label: Center
center.description: Lat,Long of the center of this group

feed.title: Feed
feed.description: Each group has a series of feeds, external data that represents the places, categories and data for the points of interest in that particular set. For each feed you define a location where the data is hosted and then a variety of options regarding map generation and display

SUBTITLE.label: Subtitle
SUBTITLE.description: An optional subtitle for this feed

BASE_URL.label: URL
BASE_URL.description: URL for the location of the feed data. Can be a file path location

CONTROLLER_CLASS.label: Controller Class
CONTROLLER_CLASS.description: Class used to parse the feed data

STATIC_MAP_CLASS.label: Static Map Class
STATIC_MAP_CLASS.description: Class used to generate the static map image

JS_MAP_CLASS.label: JavaScript Map Class
JS_MAP_CLASS.description: Class used to generate the dynamic map interface

DEFAULT_ZOOM_LEVEL.label: Zoom level
DEFAULT_ZOOM_LEVEL.description: Initial zoom level of this map
